amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Defense Production Act Purchases, $3,000,000 for a flexible Aerogel Material Supplier Initiative to develop affordable methods and a domestic supplier of military and commercial aerogels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1263 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1263 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S9391-9392; text: CR S9392) To make available from amounts available for Defense Production Act Purchases, $3,000,000 for a flexible Aerogel Material Supplier Initiative to develop affordable methods and a domestic supplier of military and commercial aerogels.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1263 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1263 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
